Level 0: Continue monitoring region for signs of overfishing and illicit activity
Level 0: Maintain surveillance of the area for indications of excessive fishing and unlawful behavior
Level 1: Reason for concern. Identify potential causes of overfishing and begin implementing measures
Level 1: Basis for worry. Recognize possible reasons for overfishing and commence execution of measures.
Level 2: High concern. Significant likelihood of extreme overfishing.
Level 2: Elevated apprehension. Substantial probability of severe overfishing.
